Data entry continues to pose significant challenges for many organizations. [According to research,](https://affine.pro/blog/top-5-free-practical-time-management-templates) **76%** of workers spend up to 3 hours each day transferring data from one place to another. Furthermore, **30%** of our time is devoted to repetitive work, while **30%** is for unnecessary meetings. It's a considerable amount of time wasted, wouldn't you agree?


![FqHlgOpYYaCWHoZLuw2rPvxGL0ZQG2S3qIk8jnaebkM=](https://insider.affine.pro/api/workspaces/H6vffRmJbCfA-r3kq_36_/blobs/FqHlgOpYYaCWHoZLuw2rPvxGL0ZQG2S3qIk8jnaebkM=)

Fortunately, there's a solution at hand. With technological advancements, manual data entry and other data recording tasks can be replaced, leading to improved operational efficiency.

In this blog, we will delve into the benefits of automated data entry and present a list of the top 9 data entry software solutions that can help alleviate these common pain points and streamline administrative work. But first, let's delve into the concept of data entry software itself. But before we embark on that journey, let's begin by clearly understanding what data entry software entails.

# What is Data entry software?


![xKGS95PVwzvOd4COri8Wg4nCoLusDm7Ly6_jesrjJCs=](https://insider.affine.pro/api/workspaces/H6vffRmJbCfA-r3kq_36_/blobs/xKGS95PVwzvOd4COri8Wg4nCoLusDm7Ly6_jesrjJCs=)

Data entry software allows you to replace expensive and inefficient paper and manual data entry processes with powerful applications that can be used on computers, smartphones, and tablets to assist and automate data capture.

Depending on your needs, data entry software could include creating electronic forms to replace paper forms, or the software can completely automate classification and data extraction from incoming documents.

Without further consideration, here are five reasons why you should use some powerful data entry software.

# 5 Reasons Why You Should Invest in Powerful Data Entry Software

* Simplified digitization of paper documents: Data entry software streamlines the process of converting physical documents into digital format by automatically extracting and transferring the data to a database or Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system.
* Accelerated processing time: Intelligent automation eliminates the need for manual data recording and entry, resulting in faster turnaround times for data entry tasks.
* Decreased occurrence of human errors: Automated solutions require minimal human intervention, reducing the likelihood of costly errors that can occur during manual data entry.
* Enhanced scalability: Automated data entry software enables you to efficiently handle increasing volumes of data entry tasks without incurring additional overhead costs.
* Cost-effective operations: By reducing turnaround time, minimizing human errors, and providing scalability options, automated data entry software significantly lowers operational costs, resulting in substantial long-term savings.
# 9 Top Data Entry Software That Will Make Your Work a Breeze

Here, we provide you with Top 9 Data Entry Software that will streamline your work effortlessly and smoothly. These powerful tools offer advanced features, intuitive interfaces, and automation capabilities to simplify data entry and boost your productivity.

# **AFFiNE**

[AFFiNE](http://affine.pro) is a tech-leading and innovative task management software, designed to help you organize, manage, and collaborate on tasks, projects, and information. Notably, it stands out as a completely free and open-source solution, utilizing offline technology to ensure accessibility for all users. This makes it a precious discovery for individuals seeking a comprehensive [task management](https://affine.pro/blog/best-trello-alternatives-2023-project-management) solution for their daily needs. Additionally, both startups and large corporations can leverage its user-friendly interface to manage group tasks with clarity and efficiency.Key Features:

* Time tracking and goal setting: Use AFFiNE’s built-in features to track your time spent on tasks and set goals to [improve your productivity](https://affine.pro/blog/how-to-write-sow-definition-free-template-example).
* Text-to-Kanban Conversion: Our new Kanban feature allows you to effortlessly convert blocks into a Kanban view with just one click.
* Custom Classifying for Maximum Flexibility: Unlike standard Kanban boards that only offer tagging, we provide unparalleled customization. Now, you can classify based on almost any property, allowing for personalized categorization that perfectly aligns with your needs.
* Intuitive Drag-and-Drop Sorting: Rearranging the order is a breeze – drag and drop items to your desired location. You have the flexibility to move entire columns or individual Kanban cards effortlessly.
* Unification of Kanban and Table Views: Any changes made in the Kanban view will automatically be reflected in the corresponding table view.

[Conexiom](https://conexiom.com/) is a cloud-based software designed to automate trade document processes for teams. By streamlining time-consuming activities, the platform enables businesses to prioritize strategic projects and foster stronger customer relationships. The software allows teams to securely access documents from any computer or device. With features like automated document validation, customizable business rules, and fast processing times, businesses can save time and money while increasing team productivity. Conexiom provides teams with complete visibility and control over data entry tools, empowering them to work efficiently.

Key Features

* Reports and dashboards for visibility into document processing speed
* Admin tools to manage users, settings, and the data entry process

* Business rules, logic, and lookups
Limitations

* Limited customization options

# Docsumo


![vtoApPpHKvZYg_BR1x7o0mFEPsagXXHpROxYoNQz808=](https://insider.affine.pro/api/workspaces/H6vffRmJbCfA-r3kq_36_/blobs/vtoApPpHKvZYg_BR1x7o0mFEPsagXXHpROxYoNQz808=)

[Docsumo](https://www.docsumo.com/) leverages machine learning to assist enterprises in capturing and analyzing data from unstructured documents. Unlike traditional methods, Docsumo's advanced technology is not limited to templates and eliminates the need for manual setups. Users can effortlessly upload documents and seamlessly transfer the extracted data to other software, eliminating the tedious process of manual data entry. With its user-friendly interface, even individuals with limited technical expertise can easily navigate and utilize Docsumo's capabilities.

Key Features:

* Automated data capture and transport
* Data management
* Data aggregation
Limitations:

* A more complex reporting system would be appreciated
* Can’t process handwritten papers effectively yet
* No data anonymization
Pricing

* Contact Docsumo for pricing
Ratings and Reviews

* Capterra: 4.6/5

# Klippa DocHorizon


![XALLw25jb9uqVl30mBRhRlPbFzWRo3do6nLSPOF-yd8=](https://insider.affine.pro/api/workspaces/H6vffRmJbCfA-r3kq_36_/blobs/XALLw25jb9uqVl30mBRhRlPbFzWRo3do6nLSPOF-yd8=)

[Klippa DocHorizon](https://www.klippa.com/en/dochorizon/) is a versatile data capture and Intelligent Document Processing (IDP) solution that can automate manual data entry tasks efficiently. It can extract data from images, license plates, utility meters, documents, PDFs, and many other objects with up to 99% accuracy.

The extracted data from Klippa DocHorizon can be conveniently received in multiple formats, such as CSV, JSON, PDF, and more. This structured data can be seamlessly transferred to various systems, including ERP systems, accounting software, or databases, without the need for manual intervention.

Key Features:

* Instantly converts a wide range of documents, including receipts, invoices, contracts, forms, and passports, into structured data
* Utilizes AI-enhanced software to capture unstructured data from any type of document
* Automates data entry with a powerful engine for accurate data extraction and parsing
Limitations:

* A data reporting system has not yet been developed
* User-Interface is under development
Pricing

* Contact Docsumo for pricing
Ratings and Reviews

* G2: N

nTask is a task management platform designed to help managers handle manual data entry processes efficiently and securely. With the nTask platform, managers can create task lists and assign specific tasks to team members or groups of users with ease. Not only does this help streamline data entry processes, but it also ensures that all tasks are properly handled in a timely fashion.

Key Features

* TImesheet monitoring for data verification
* Document sharing and file management

Limitations

# Rossum


![vT6BXnpXNmxTq0VJ_LM6q7x0niCEsstLc0IdiRNJ1IA=](https://insider.affine.pro/api/workspaces/H6vffRmJbCfA-r3kq_36_/blobs/vT6BXnpXNmxTq0VJ_LM6q7x0niCEsstLc0IdiRNJ1IA=)

[Rossum](https://www.klippa.com/en/compare/rossum/) is an AI-based cloud document processing solution that automates business processes. It can be used to receive documents across multiple channels, categorize documents, automate data capture, validate data, and integrate into accounting software.

Rossum is a solid platform for automated data entry when it concerns financial documents such as invoices. It is ISO 27001 certified and HIPAA compliant, which is why it is trusted by large corporations.

Key Features:

* Data extraction
* Email address extraction
* Data capture and transfer
Limitations:

* Lacks data analytics
* No cross-checks with 3rd party database
* Can’t process documents with a large number of pages
* No data anonymization
Pricing:

* Premium: Starts at €5/month
* Effective: Starts at €4/month
Ratings and Reviews

* Capterra: 4.2/5 (100+ reviews)
* G2: 4.4/5 (10+ reviews)

# **Zoho Forms**


![S_doNbpMbfNzi2jsKbikiLIpQIXSrRilAOcv7MxqH08=](https://insider.affine.pro/api/workspaces/H6vffRmJbCfA-r3kq_36_/blobs/S_doNbpMbfNzi2jsKbikiLIpQIXSrRilAOcv7MxqH08=)

[Zoho Forms](https://www.zoho.com/forms/) is an online tool that simplifies data collection and reduces paperwork for teams. It enables users to create customized electronic forms for gathering information from various groups. These forms can be easily shared, and the collected data is securely stored in real-time on Zoho Forms' platform.

Key Features

* Responsive web forms to submit and access from anywhere
* Tabular column cataloging to perform task actions
* Natural language processing capabilities
* 30+ field types with customizable properties
Limitations

* There aren’t a lot of form template options
* If a user wants to return to a form later, they have to save a code snippet first. This can drive away the average user
Pricing

* Basic: $10/month, billed annually
* Standard: $25/month, billed annually
* Professional: $50/month, billed annually
* Premium: $90/month, billed annually
